attacks.name: Foresight
attacks.effect: Look at the top 5 cards of either player's deck and put them back on top of that player's deck in any order.

attacks.name: Overrun
attacks.effect: Choose 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. This attack does 20 damage to that Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
